section.title: Forgery Cost Bounds
section.t: This section establishes lower bounds on the computational cost of forging Proof of Process evidence, providing quantifiable security guarantees for Relying Parties.

section.title: Cost Model
section.t: The total cost of forging an evidence chain of duration D with n evidence packets is:

list.t: C_vdf is the cost of computing n VDF proofs sequentially, which cannot be parallelized below T_difficulty sequential steps per proof.
C_entropy is the cost of generating synthetic behavioral data with sufficient entropy to pass statistical tests.
C_hardware is the cost of obtaining a valid device attestation certificate (zero for software-only tiers, significant for hardware-bound tiers).
